description: The file defines the 'Resolver' class responsible for loading, validating, and querying resolution files within the WPEFramework plugin namespace. It includes declarations for loading paths, retrieving data, and internal file loading, utilizing external modules 'Module.h' and 'ResolutionStore.h'.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: A class that manages resolution files, providing methods for loading paths, retrieving resolution data, and internal file loading functionalities.

methods.name: LoadPaths
methods.description: Loads resolution files from specified directory paths and reports errors if any.

methods.name: bool Get(const string & appId,const string & method,const Core::JSON::Object & params,Core::JSON::Object & out) const
methods.description: Queries the stored resolution data for a specific application ID and method, using provided parameters, and outputs the result.

methods.name: LoadFile
methods.description: Internally loads a specific resolution file given its path, reporting errors if any.

ctags.name: Get
ctags.pattern: /^    bool Get(const string& appId, const string& method, const Core::JSON::Object& params, Core::/
ctags.signature: (const string & appId,const string & method,const Core::JSON::Object & params,Core::JSON::Object & out) const
